articles.author: Lizzie Johnson
articles.title: After ‘good’ Trump meeting, Zelensky pushes Europe hard to do more - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump and White House envoy Witkoff have said a deal to resolve nearly four years of war between Russia and Ukraine is close.
articles.content: KYIV Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky aimed a blistering speech at Europe during the World Economic Forum on Thursday after a last-minute meeting with President Donald Trump, which both leaders… [+134 chars]

articles.author: Akilah Johnson
articles.title: Scientists discover new clue linking obesity to dementia risk - The Washington Post
articles.description: European researchers trace a path that shows how high blood pressure caused by excess weight could be the link to certain cognitive brain disease.
articles.content:
Obesity in midlife may cause vascular dementia later in life by raising blood pressure over decadesand quietly damaging brain vessels, according to new research released Thursday.

articles.title: Dow jumps 400 points as stocks rebound for a second day after Trump calls off Greenland-related tariffs: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Major U.S. stock averages immediately jumped after President Donald Trump said he would no longer impose his new Europe tariffs that were set to begin Feb. 1.
articles.content:
Stocks rose Thursday after easing geopolitical fears sparked a broad-based market rally. Traders also looked ahead to a key inflation reading due in the morning.
